evaluation.visualFeatures: Eczematous rash, Scattered papules, nasal and mouth area.
evaluation.treatment: Stop facial products, use gentle soap-free cleansers, topical treatment - metronidazole - 0.75% cream - twice a day, if no improvement - doxycycline 100mg daily - 4 to 6 weeks.
evaluation.alternativePlan: If no improvement within 4 weeks - erythromycin 250 mg 4 times a day - 4 to 6 weeks.
evaluation.followUp: Follow-up - 6 weeks, if no improvement - referral â€“ dermatologists
